Package org.cloudbus.cloudsim.lists

Class PeList

java.lang.Object
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.lists.PeList
public class PeList
extends java.lang.Object
PeList is a collection of operations on lists of PEs.
Since:
CloudSim Toolkit 2.0

    • getById

      public static <T extends Pe> Pe getById​(java.util.List<Pe> peList, int id)
      Gets MIPS Rating for a specified Pe ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the Pe ID
      peList - the pe list
      Returns:
      the MIPS rating if exists, otherwise returns -1

      Gets a Pe ID which is FREE.

      peList - the pe list

      number of Pe

    • setPeStatus

      public static <T extends Pe> boolean setPeStatus​(java.util.List<Pe> peList, int id, int status)
      Sets the Pe status.
      Parameters:
      status - Pe status, either Pe.FREE or Pe.BUSY
      id - the id
      peList - the pe list
      Returns:
      true if the Pe status has been changed, false otherwise (Pe id might not be exist)

    • getNumberOfBusyPes

      Returns:
      number of Pe

    • setStatusFailed

      public static <T extends Pe> void setStatusFailed​(java.util.List<Pe> peList, java.lang.String resName, int hostId, boolean failed)
      Sets the status of PEs of this machine to FAILED. NOTE: resName and machineID are used for debugging purposes, which is ON by default. Use #setStatusFailed(boolean) if you do not want this information.
      Parameters:
      resName - the name of the resource
      hostId - the id of this machine
      failed - the new value for the "failed" parameter

    • setStatusFailed

      public static <T extends Pe> void setStatusFailed​(java.util.List<Pe> peList, boolean failed)
      Sets the status of PEs of this machine to FAILED.
      Parameters:
      failed - the new value for the "failed" parameter
      peList - the pe list
